name: Woman Superheroes
motto: Our Balls are Bigger there Yours, We just Wear them on our Chests!

name: The Hulk
motto: Don't make me angry. You wouldn't like me when I'm angry

name: Batman
motto: I am the vengeance, I am the night, I am BATMAN!

name: Red Lantern Corps
motto: With blood and rage of crimson red, ripped from a corpse so freshly dead, together with our hellish hate, we'll burn you all, that is your fate!
